title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8200-3.3 - Transition provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8200-3.3 - Transition provisions

State Regulations
(a) Applications for increased depreciation for railroad ceilings established for
assessment rolls to be completed in 2004, must be submitted by September 1, 2003, or within 60 days of the effective date of this Subpart, whichever is
later. (b) Any railroad ceiling
established for an assessment roll finalized in 2003 shall reflect increased
depreciation calculated in the percentages contained in section
8200-3.2
(d) of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8200-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
